name: Despised Icon
description:
'''Despised Icon''' is a Canadian [[deathcore]] band from [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]]. Formed in 2002, the band is noted for the talent of its drummer, Alex Pelletier, who makes frequent use of the [[blast beat|blasting]] technique, as well as for its dual lead vocalists; Alex Erian and Steve Marois. They are credited as the pioneers of deathcore, alongside [[Antagony]].

In April 2010, the band disbanded, but officially re-formed six years later in April 2016 after playing reunion shows in 2014 and 2015. Collectively the group has released six full-length albums while succumbing to very few lineup changes throughout their run.
